channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Neighbour feeding pigeons, 17th August
item.description:
Despite us politely asking our neighbours at no.15 Keyworth Close to stop feeding Pigeons in the back garden they continue to feed them (1 year)the noise, disturbance, health risk. The pigeons fly close to our bedroom windows, we have to close them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Keyworth Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old kitchen units dumped on street, 17th August
item.description:
Old kitchen units have been dumped at the top of Ryedale at the junction with Underhill Road from a house opposite on Underhill Road. The waste was dumped on the night of 15th or 16th August.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Ryedale, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road not swept for a month, 17th August
item.description:
Despite reporting this problem 3 times recently, Colberg Pl has not been swept for a month, with litter on the pavement and gutter. In frustration, I spent an hour cleaning the south side of the road today. Glass at No. 1 and the North side stil need doing

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colberg Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle may be stolen and dumped, 17th August
item.description:
Vehicle has been abandoned for several weeks. We have asked neighbours but no one knows who the car belongs to. Vehicle looks in some disrepair and maybe stolen and dumped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Culling Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip in public footpath, 17th August
item.description:
Dumped rubbish, pallet etc. The dumped recycling bin attracts it and needs to be removed. Fly-tipping blackspot

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Canterbury Grove, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wobbling Step, 17th August
item.description:
One of the steps at this location is sliding down when stepped on. It is a slip/trip hazard. It is to the left-hand side of the center. It is the fourth row up, close to the other broken step I reported yesterday. Both these steps gave previously been reported a few months ago. They still have not been made safe. Please ensure this is dealt with before someone suffers an injury.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tideslea Path, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 17th August
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown planting, 17th August
item.description:
Tree pit outside 3 Sutton Place has very large, overgrown planting rather than a tree. The plants encroach onto the pavement, collect litter, unfortunately attract public urination + anti social behaviour. Pls replace with a tree are per rest of street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sutton Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees are broken, 17th August
item.description:
Misuse of the green area by the public sitting and palying on the plants, also dumping over the plants caused tree broken, fly tapping and smell surrounding the residential area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ingestre Place, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish overspill and possibly fly tipped to the right of Sainsbury's again, 17th August
item.description:
This is the second time this year I have had to report this issue the first was fixed very quickly and I hoped that was the end of it, however the situation has reoccurred. I believe main users of these bins are the flats above the takeaway and other shops to the right of Sainsburys. Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
